about_the_game:
-That magical girl has abandoned her costume and become a stick!!!

This is an STG where the spinning stick is your ship. It can turn and attack in all directions! The strongest!　
But because it's a stick, you have to work hard to avoid bullets and walls! Defective! That's what this game is about.

!attention! At a minimum, the menus are in English, but the conversation, etc. is not in English.

(It's a pretty old game, made in the winter of 2016.
When the Steam version was released, it was readjusted to make it a little easier to play, including strengthening the Kurun-chan)

Game Features

  • Spin around and attack! You can switch between a wide attack and a concentrated attack laser!

    .

  • It's quite hard to avoid walls and bullets by turning the stick! But it could be fun. ......!
  • You can play a little at a time whenever you like, as each stage is a stage-clearing type
  • You can increase your maximum HP and power up with items from the store! If you play carefully, you will get stronger!
  • Customize the speed of movement and rotation of the stick. You can make the stick your favorite!
  • Although it is a stick in the game, Imaginary Kurun-chan will talk cutely in the story part.
  • If you have a hot STG soul, choose Challenge mode from CONFIG!

    Story

    Kurun, who wants to become an amazing magical girl with fun, spends her time idly with her partner, the bear mascot Ma-kun.
    The quickest way to become a great magical girl is to defeat the bad guys!
    Conveniently, Ma-kun found an interdimensional space where he sensed the presence of evil, and the two decided to investigate immediately!
    There are many enemies in the other dimensional space! It's too much for Kurun, an apprentice Puella Magi!
    It can't be helped. She uses the magic power from her fashionable outfit to attack!
    Kurun Destroy Mode! This is how Kurun, now in the form of a stick, wages a heated battle in the other dimensional space.
    It seems that the master of the ...... other dimensional space also has some kind of purpose. ......?

    Distribution Guidelines

    We welcome live streaming to play "Magic stick girl Miracle Kururun".
    If you can include the game title "Magic stick girl Miracle Kururun" in the distribution, it will be easier for the author to find it.
    We would appreciate it if you could include the Steam store page in the description of the game so that viewers can find the game more easily.
    (We don't mean that you can't live streaming the game if you don't write the description.)
